title: of the Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Child Benefit and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Child Benefit and 

Working Family Payment) (Temporary Provisions) Regulations 2024. 

Temporary variation of rate of child benefit
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited social welfare (child benefit working family payment) (temporary provisions) regulation 2024 temporary variation rate child benefit

title: of the Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child
text_raw:
2. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to child 

benefit. 

(2) Subject to sub-article (4), in the case of a person to whom this article 
applies, a child benefit payment payable to that person in respect of 5 November 
2024 shall be increased by 100%. 

(3) Subject to sub-article (4), in the case of a person to whom this article 
applies, a child benefit payment payable to that person in respect of 3 December 
2024 shall be increased by 100%. 

(4) An increase under sub-article (2) or sub-article (3) shall not be payable 

in the case of an entitlement under section 221B. 

Temporary variation of rate of working family payment

title: of the Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No.
heading: 3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to working
text_raw:
3. (1) This article applies to a person who is, or becomes, entitled to working 

family payment. 

(2) In the case of a person to whom this article applies, the working family 
payment payable to that person in respect of the period commencing on 7 
November 2024 and expiring on 13 November 2024, shall be increased by €400. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[602] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [602]

title: of the Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for double payment bonuses to recipients of Child 
Benefit in November and December 2024, and a €400 bonus payment to 
recipients of the Working Family Payment on 7 November 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [602] 5
